messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: There is a syndicate communications agent, do ignore its patheticness

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: If the clown beats Beau,the shuttle will be called, if beau wins, it won't be

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: They say there is always something to do, so, build a rage cage clown, a big, brutal one full of weapons and electrified grilles, do it for the honkmother

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Have you completed the station goal yet?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to repeated insubordination and cases of insantity from your captain, he is deemed to be unfit for duty. You are free to mutiny against him with no punishment.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We are now an independent station against Centcomm

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: GET TO EVAC RIGHT NOW OR THE ASH DRAKE WILL KILL YOU
